title: Sooners Power Past Tech in Opener - University of Oklahoma - Soonersports.com

description: LUBBOCK, Texas â€“ Oklahoma blasted six home runs and took advantage of six stolen bases to defeat No. 5 Texas Tech 13-8 Thursday evening in the series opener at Rip Griffin Park.
